Description: Required Skills to be successful•   Experience in Freight Industry•   Excellent knowledge in all aspects of Middle East cross border transportation •   Thorough knowledge about GCC customs and border regulations, Free zones in UAE and neighboring markets•   Experience in Cargo wise About the Team This role will report to the General Manager – Freight Services and you will also attend and manage Global Key Accounts and Partners for road freight requests.
